newsitem.title: UK: SDX Business Systems shares set premium.
newsitem.headline: SDX Business Systems shares set premium.

text.p: Shares in telephone systems group SDX Business Systems Plc set a premium on their first day of trade on London Stock Exchange on Wednesday.
The shares closed at 172-1/2p with 4.2 million shares traded, after being placed at 160p with institutional shareholders.
The issue valued SDX at 56.8 million stg and raised 7.1 million stg net, which will be used to cut borrowing and to redeem preference shares.
The float was sponsored by Kleinwort Benson.
